Outbound network connections to servers.Action: Monitor Zeek ssl.log for outbound connections presenting certificates. Extract certificate details (issuer, subject, validity dates, hash). Use statistical analysis (e.g., frequency counting, set difference against a baseline) to identify certificates with hashes not previously observed or observed infrequently. Flag connections using certificates with short validity periods. Focus on certificates from unknown issuers.

Network connections to destinations whos.Data: Zeek ssl.log, Zeek conn.log, Threat Intelligence Feed
Network connections to destinations whos.Action: Extract certificate hashes or other unique identifiers from Zeek ssl.log for outbound connections. Perform an inner join or correlation analysis comparing extracted certificate hashes/details with threat intelligence feeds of known malicious certificates or associated infrastructure IPs. Investigate connections where certificate information matches known indicators of compromise.
